## 1: Which is the Most Popular Ramen Product?

### Data source

```{r}
RamenFile<- file.choose()
```
```{r}
RamenData<- 
  data.table::fread(RamenFile) %>%
  as.data.frame()
```
```{r}
str(RamenData)
```
```{r}
head(RamenData)
```
```{r}
Ramen <- 
  RamenData%>%
  select()
```
